long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate leads on LinkedIn by exporting all the subscribers of your LinkedIn newsletter.

Easily export the subscriber users of your LinkedIn newsletter to create a list of potential leads.

v2.0.0 Update
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.
